songs.title: Leatherface*
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: King Gordy]
Uh
We get to slicin' and stabbin’
We got no mask with axes
Leatherface
We will pull op on your avenue, slaughter your family like animals
Leatherface
We eat your body like cannibals
Run and the wolves will come after you
Leatherface
Sorry we won't stop attacking you, chop you and fuckin' kidnap you bitch
Leatherface, Leatherface, Leatherface
Leatherface, Leatherface, Leatherface
Leatherface, Leatherface, Leatherface

[Bridge: King Gordy]
We eat your body like cannibals
Run and the wolves will come after you
Leatherface
Sorry we won’t stop attacking you, chop you and fuckin' kidnap you bitch
Leatherface

[Verse: King Gordy]
I'm sicker with verses
This clip is dispersin' you into hearses
Then into the church and into the dirt
Your body will fill up with worms then
I am psychotic, erotic, bionic
High of the chronic and I don't think logic and I'm in your closet I'm hidin'
As fucking as soon you walk

[Verse: Hopsin]
Listen
It’s 11.30 p.m. and you ’bout to fall asleep and I'm at your window with a mask on (Shh! Huh?)
I proceed to climbin’ through the gatter on with a machete that I'm 'bout to shove into your backbone
Then cut it down until your asshole, I bloody up your fuckin' bathrobe (Bitch)
And if your wife is awake and she witnessin’ what I'm doin'
I kill her then I fill her pussy up with tampons
Yes I'm that gross (Yeah)
When it rains it pours
Especially when my blade is pulled
The deeds paid it for
I'm butt naked in your neighbors pool
I stay stuntin' when I'm face fuckin' a decapitated skull
You ever seen that before?
Freak nasty gore
I need asking lord
So please ask the lord
For three trashy whores with knee pads of course
Who deepthroat while my balls swing back and forth
I like it like that (Yeah)
Bitch don't you try to fight back (No)
All you now realizing I have (What?)
I can't allow the fluid I'ma jam e'rybody to your fuckin' cleavage area
And damn it I'ma
